elements.name: panel1
elements.title: What opportunities do retail companies have to influence the sustainability of their work processes? Name at least two specific opportunities to exert influence in each area of activity.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Procurement of goods
elements.correctAnswer: Sustainable and regional products; optimal order quantity and optimal order time; choice of producers and suppliers; disposal of packaging material

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Transportation
elements.correctAnswer: Optimization of transport routes; use of climate-neutral vehicles; choice of packaging

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Storage of goods
elements.correctAnswer: Correct storage; keeping order; optimal stock levels

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Sale of goods
elements.correctAnswer: Lighting in sales outlets (sales area, shop windows, etc.); air conditioning and heating in sales outlets; energy-efficient cooling systems, lighting and heating; reducing returns; reducing packaging material; sustainable packaging material; donating unsold goods; recycling

elements.name: question5
elements.title: Administration
elements.correctAnswer: Reduction of resource consumption (paper, energy, etc.); energy-efficient lighting and heating; employee development and training; promoting innovation; good working conditions; recycling; efficient company organization; supply chain management; sustainability management
